publisher.publisher-name: Larousse et le Département de littérature française de l'université Paris-8

title-group.article-title: Sartre, « miroir critique » de Maupassant dans "La Nausée:" des « imaginations naturalistes » au fantastique « en trompe-l'œil »

abstract.p: The literary histories writers implicitly build in their fictions are particularly interesting in what they tell us about the way in which literary fields can or do shift. Sartre's relationship to Maupassant is such an example: that of an author coming of age in the late 1930s, through the 19th century.
